titles.title: A resolution congratulating the people of the Czech Republic and the Slovak Republic on the 30th anniversary of their independence and recognizing their substantial support to Ukraine against Russian aggression.

A resolution congratulating the people of the Czech Republic and the Slovak Republic on the 30th anniversary of their independence and recognizing their substantial support to Ukraine against Russian aggression.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the people of Czechia and Slovakia for overthrowing communist rule in 1989 and for 30 years of independence. Specifically, it applauds the cultural achievements of Czechia and Slovakia, commends the two countries' commitment to NATO and the European Union, and expresses gratitude for their support for the people of Ukraine.
